original_text:
Book of Maya
Caratteristiche generali
Software: Novomatic
Rulli: 5x 3 righe
Linee di vincita: 10
Puntata min.: 0,20 €
Puntata max.: 10 €
Max. di monete: 1
Tema e grafica
Con Book of Maya, gioco di punta della Novomatic, viaggiamo nella giungla alla scoperta degli antichi tempi aztechi.
Entriamo dunque nei panni dell’esploratore per trovare il tesoro perduto dei Maya, seguendo tracce e indizi speciali.
La grafica è suggestiva pur non essendo particolarmente elaborata: mancano le animazioni 3D e non sono presenti effetti speciali.
Il punto di forza di questa slot è tuttavia proprio la sua semplicità, con una schermata iniziale “adagiata” su un antico tempio e poche distrazioni per il giocatore che vuole puntare dritto al sodo.
Simboli, Wild e Scatter
L’iconografia di Book of Maya riprende gli antichi simboli della cultura azteca, tra cui le maschere e le divinità, a cui sono affiancate le classiche carte da gioco, dal 9 all’asso, come da tradizione nelle slot machine terrestri e in quelle online firmate Novomatic.
Il simbolo più importante è il libro di Maya appunto, che è non rappresenta solamente il simbolo Wild ma anche lo Scatter.
Come si gioca?
Le vincite su Book of Maya sono assegnate quando vi è un allineamento dei diversi simboli da sinistra verso destra. L’importo della vincita è diverso a seconda sia del numero di simboli che appaiono sul rullo, con un minimo di tre, sia del valore dei simboli stessi, con le carte che danno la vincita più bassa e le figure quelle più alte.
Una caratteristica molto amata in questa slot è la possibilità di personalizzare ogni giocata, scegliendo l’importo da giocare e su quante linee di pagamento puntare.
La puntata massima su Book of Maya è di 1000 €, ed è possibile aumentare in maniera consistente le vincite quando appare sulla schermata il simbolo Scatter (antico libro Maya), che paga a prescindere da quale sia la posizione che occupa sui rulli.
Oltre a questo, Book of Maya propone la modalità Extra Bet, con la quale si possono vincere degli ulteriori giri gratuiti mentre si giocano le partite bonus.
Immancabile la funzione Gamble, che si attiva automaticamente dopo qualsiasi vincita: sulla schermata appare mano di carte da gioco, e si può decidere di scommettere sul colore, rosso o nero. In caso di scommessa giusta la vincita sarà raddoppiata, in caso contrario si perderà il premio iniziale. Per la funzione Gamble si ha dunque una possibilità di vincita random del 50 %.
In conclusione
Linearità, facilità di gioco e molteplici possibilità di vincita sono le caratteristiche che hanno reso Book of Maya una delle slot di punta della Novomatic.
Non vi stupirà con colonne sonore e grafiche spettacolari, ma vi terrà incollati allo schermo grazie alle numerose funzionalità, giochi bonus e funzione Gamble, adatta ai giocatori più intrepidi.
Slot simili
La tematica delle antiche civiltà è stata ampiamente sviluppata nel mondo delle slot machine.
Molto simile come tema rispetto a Book of Maya è Mayan Riches della IGT, mentre se ci spostiamo nell’antico Egitto, troviamo la famosissima Book of Ra, ma anche diversi titoli meno noti tra cui Solar Queen.

raw_translation.response:
Book of Maya
General Features
Software: Novomatic
Reels: 5 x 3 rows
Paylines: 10
Min. Bet: €0.20
Max. Bet: €10
Max. Coins: 1
Theme & Graphics
Book of Maya, Novomatic's flagship game, takes us on a journey through the jungle to discover the ancient Aztec times.
We put ourselves in the shoes of an explorer to find the lost treasure of the Maya, following special clues and tracks.
The graphics are evocative, albeit not particularly elaborate: 3D animations are missing, and there are no special effects.
However, the strength of this slot lies precisely in its simplicity, with an "adagio" initial screen on an ancient temple and few distractions for the player who wants to go straight to the point.
Symbols, Wild & Scatter
The iconography of Book of Maya draws from the ancient symbols of Aztec culture, including masks and deities, along with the classic playing cards from 9 to Ace, following tradition in both land-based and online slots by Novomatic.
The most crucial symbol is, precisely, the Book of Maya, which is not only the Wild symbol but also the Scatter.
How to Play
Wins on Book of Maya are awarded when there is an alignment of different symbols from left to right. The amount of the win depends on both the number of symbols that appear on the reel, with a minimum of three, and the value of the symbols themselves, with cards giving the lowest win and figures the highest.
A much-loved feature in this slot is the ability to customize every bet, choosing the amounts and how many paylines to bet on.
The maximum bet on Book of Maya is €1000, and you can increase profits significantly when the Scatter symbol (ancient Maya book) appears on the screen, which pays regardless of its position on the reels.
In addition to this, Book of Maya offers the Extra Bet mode, with which you can win additional free spins while playing bonus rounds.
The Gamble function is also not missing, which is activated automatically after any win: a hand of playing cards appears, and you can decide to bet on the color, red or black. In case of the right bet, the win will be doubled; otherwise, you'll lose the initial prize. The Gamble function, therefore, has a random winning chance of 50%.
In conclusion
Linearity, ease of play, and multiple winning possibilities are the features that have made Book of Maya one of Novomatic's flagship slots.
It won't amaze you with spectacular soundtracks and graphics, but it will keep you glued to the screen thanks to the numerous features, bonus games, and Gamble function, suitable for the most intrepid players.
Similar Slots
The theme of ancient civilizations has been extensively developed in the world of slot machines.
Very similar in theme to Book of Maya is Mayan Riches from IGT, while if we move to ancient Egypt, we find the famous Book of Ra, but also several lesser-known titles including Solar Queen.

Review: Book of Maya Slot
General Features
Software: Novomatic
Reels: 5x 3 rows
Paylines: 10
Minimum bet: €0.20
Maximum bet: €10
Max coins: 1
Theme and Graphics
With Book of Maya, Novomatic's flagship game, we venture into the jungle to discover the ancient Aztec times.
We therefore step into the shoes of an explorer to find the lost treasure of the Maya, following special clues and trails.
The graphics are suggestive, although not particularly elaborate: there are no 3D animations or special effects.
However, the strength of this slot is precisely its simplicity, with an initial screen "resting" on an ancient temple and few distractions for the player who wants to get straight to the point.
Symbols, Wilds and Scatters
The iconography of Book of Maya takes up the ancient symbols of Aztec culture, including masks and deities, alongside the classic playing cards from 9 to ace, as is tradition in land-based and Novomatic online slot machines.
The most important symbol is the book of Maya itself, which not only represents the Wild symbol, but also the Scatter.
How to play?
Wins on Book of Maya are awarded when there is an alignment of different symbols from left to right. The amount of the win depends on the number of symbols that appear on the reel, with a minimum of three, as well as the value of the symbols themselves, with the cards providing the lowest win and the figures the highest.
A much-loved feature in this slot is the ability to customize every play by choosing the amount to play and how many paylines to bet on.
The maximum bet on Book of Maya is €1000, and it is possible to significantly increase winnings when the Scatter symbol (ancient Maya book) appears on the screen, paying regardless of its position on the reels.
In addition to this, Book of Maya offers the Extra Bet mode, which allows for additional free spins during bonus rounds.
The Gamble feature is also a must, which is activated automatically after any win: a hand of playing cards appears on the screen, and one can choose to bet on the color, red or black. In case of correct bet, the win is doubled, otherwise the initial prize is lost. For the Gamble feature, there is a random chance of winning of 50%.
In conclusion
Linearity, ease of play, and multiple chances of winning are the characteristics that have made Book of Maya one of Novomatic's flagship slots.
It won't surprise you with spectacular soundtracks or graphics, but it will keep you glued to the screen thanks to its numerous features, bonus games, and Gamble feature, suitable for the most daring players.
Similar Slots
The theme of ancient civilizations has been extensively developed in the world of slot machines.
Very similar in theme to Book of Maya is Mayan Riches by IGT, while if we move to ancient Egypt, we find the famous Book of Ra, as well as several lesser-known titles such as Solar Queen.
